item.title: How to Delete Sticky Notes in the Microsoft Sticky Notes App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Delete a Sticky Note: With Menu With Click From the Notes List With Right Click With Keyboard Shortcut No time to scroll down? Click through this presentation tutorial: Watch a video tutorial: How to Delete a Sticky Note With Menu Step 1: First open a sticky note. Go to the upper right and click the “Menu” or “…” button. Step 2: In the menu that opens, click “Delete note”.
